title: Wish vs eBay Gaming PC CHALLENGE
description: Don't buy either of these gaming PCs just build it yourself lol How to cook a meal using a Ryzen processor:  I found the PERFECT (almost) keyboard:   My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel This Is!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
